gw.bizrules.pcf

Interface RuleListPageHelper.IteratorCheckedValuesRuleVersionAccessor

  • Enclosing class:
    RuleListPageHelper<R extends Rule>

    public static interface RuleListPageHelper.IteratorCheckedValuesRuleVersionAccessor
    Defines a checked (selected) values accessor for a row iterator based on either a specific Rule subtype or the RuleVersion of a Rule. This supports access to both the RuleVersions (directly selected or associated with the selected Rules) and a single- selected Rule independent of the actual based-on type of the row iterator for various shared Rule toolbar button sets and their actions.

    This operates in concert with RuleQueryResults value when the row iterator is based on a Rule subtype.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<RuleVersion> getRuleVersions() 
      Rule getSingleRule() 

    • Method Detail

      • getRuleVersions

        java.util.List<RuleVersion> getRuleVersions()
        Returns:
        The RuleVersions for the checked (selected) values.

      • getSingleRule

        Rule getSingleRule()
        Returns:
        The Rule for the single checked (selected) value.
